org.krysalis.barcode4j.impl.code128
Interface Code128Encoder

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultCode128Encoder
public interface Code128Encoder

This interface is implemented by classes that encode a Code128 message into an integer array representing character set indexes.

Version:
$Id: Code128Encoder.java,v 1.1 2004/09/12 17:57:52 jmaerki Exp $
Author:
Jeremias Maerki

Method Summary
 int[] encode(java.lang.String msg)
          Encodes a valid Code 128 message to an array of character set indexes.
 

Method Detail

encode

public int[] encode(java.lang.String msg)
Encodes a valid Code 128 message to an array of character set indexes.

Parameters:
msg - the message to encode
Returns:
the requested array of indexes
